q: Other NFL Capsules: Dallas Mayor Tom disavows` key' presentation to Michael Vick DALLAS( AP)- The Mayor Tom of Dallas says he did not sanction giving Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick a key to the city. Michael Vick won The Associated Press Comeback Player of the Year award this past season, his second in the NFL since serving 18 months in prison for operating a dogfighting operation. More than a dozen people were also injured.` Progress every day' On Sunday, Senator Kirsten Gillibrand , said Ms Gabrielle Giffords was`` doing great'' and`` making progress every day''. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Ms Kirsten Gillibrand said on NBC's Meet The Press programme.`` It's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury,'' she added. Jan. 23( Bloomberg)-- Former Secretary of State Colin Powell , a Republican who supported Democratic Barack Obama in the 2008 election, said he's not committed' to supporting Barack Obama or a specific Republican candidate in 2012.`` I'm not committed to Barack Obama , I'm not committed to a Republican candidate, Colin Powell , a retired Army general who was chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, said on CNN's`` State of the Union'' program today. Thirdly, Eric Schmidt said Google wants to increase the availability of inexpensive smartphones in poor regions. We envision literally a billion people getting inexpensive, browser-based touchscreen phones over the next few years. Can you imagine how this will change their awareness of local and global information and their notion of education? he wrote.
